amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part A of House Report 116-79 to require the Director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau to issue an annual report to Congress of consumer complaints from older Americans, including a state-by-state breakdown of complaints by type of consumer financial product or service and any legislative or regulatory recommendations by the Director.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Neguse.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
